cn: 兔子帶著我們穿梭在神祕的洞穴裡，該去哪邊好呢？
跳著、跳著，跳進了森林旁邊的午夜遊樂園，
跟月亮說晚安，燈暗了，進入甜甜的夢鄉。
加快腳步，搭乘太空船飛到月球，跟外星人交個朋友，
好奇怪！房間竟然顛倒過來了，天花板變成地板，地板變成了天花板⋯⋯
噓～別出聲，地下洞穴埋藏了強盜的寶藏，寶藏可以用來做什麼呢?
en: The rabbit took us shuttle through the mysterious cave, where should we go?
Jump, Jump, Jump into the Midnight Fair next to the Forest.
Say goodnight to the moon, the light’s dark, fell into the sweet dream.
Speed up, fly to the moon by spaceship, and make friends with aliens.
Weird! The room turned upside down, the ceiling became the floor, the floor became the ceiling…
Shh…there is a robber’s treasure buried in the underground cave. What can the treasure be used for?

books.title: 《哪邊是哪邊》
info: 兔子帶著我們穿梭在神祕的洞穴裡，該去哪邊好呢？
